title: FS - T205 Two faced Roger Bresnahan Closed Mouth, Polar Bear PSA 3.5
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: FS - T205 Two faced Roger Bresnahan Closed Mouth, Polar Bear PSA 3.5
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a unique T205 Roger Bresnahan with Closed Mouth graded PSA 3.5  This card has a Polar Bear reverse and Bresnahan's face/head has been double printed/shifted as the pictures show.  Most prominent is the mouth, chin, eyes and cap shift.

$325 venmo friends or $340 pp gs.  Please pm if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.
